items.title: Research Assistant
details: Under the guidance of Dr.Suraish Kumar – Department of Biotechnology .
Quantitative analysis of phase variations in Reactive Oxygen species in algal cells.
Understanding the relationship between ROS (reactive Oxygen species) and Cancer in HeLa cell lines.

items.title: Research Intern
details: Assisted the on-going 4 year research study on snake species abundance and distribution.
Visual survey and documentation of various species of snakes in Agumbe Rain forest (Within study area)
Leading interested non biologist groups on nature trails and camps.

items: Was the National topper for Biology in 2013. (top 0.1%)
Recepient, Macintosh scholarship for academic excellence (2013 - present)
Recepient, SHE Scholarship for being among the top 1% in CBSE board exams held in 2013. This scholarchip funds undergraduate tuition upto 4 lakh INR
Scored 97.72 percentile in the 12th National Science Olympiad

items.headline: BNHS (Bombay Natural History Society) – member
points: Locations : Gir national park , Amboli , Coorg

items.headline: SSTCN – Volunteer (Student sea turtle conservation network)
points: Turtle walks along the Marina coast during Olive Ridley nesting season – to identify and relocate eggs to hatchery and subsequent release of hatchlings into sea to ensure better rates of survival in species.

items.headline: Scrub society , Madras Christian College – Core member
points: Organisation and coordination regular of clean-up activities, bird walks, tree census and documentation, awareness creation

items.headline: Rescue of injured stray animals with AWPT (Animal Welfare Protection Trust)
points: Frequent rescue of local stray animals injured or otherwise and consequent rehabilitation

undergrad_courses.name: Classical taxonomy and classification (Invertebrata and vertebrata)

items: Organiser and Co-ordinator of cultural events – Go Wild
Coordinator of College culturals – Deep Woods.
Trained in Indian classical dance forms – Bharatnatyam and Kathak.
